Welcome to the research laboratory on dependable distributed systems (D2S) at Science Tokyo (formerly: Tokyo Institute of Technology). Our research combines theory and practice of distributed systems (Cloud, IoT, cooperative robotics, ...); from the design of distributed algorithms that can survive the actions of malicious nodes to the development of middleware platforms aimed at such systems. The lab is headed by Xavier Défago together with François Bonnet.
